docs.snippet: A white Alabama police officer was charged with murder Wednesday in the shooting death of a black man who, a family lawyer says, was walking home when he was slain outside a neighbor's house....
docs.lead_paragraph: A white Alabama police officer was charged with murder Wednesday in the shooting death of a black man who, a family lawyer says, was walking home when he was slain outside a neighbor's house.

headline.main: Alabama Officer Charged With Murder in Man's Fatal Shooting
headline.print_headline: Alabama Officer Charged With Murder in Man's Fatal Shooting

docs.snippet: One is an Air Force veteran. The other worked in fashion. Together they have beaten back the isolation that often goes with child-rearing....
docs.lead_paragraph: One is an Air Force veteran. The other worked in fashion. Together they have beaten back the isolation that often goes with child-rearing.
docs.abstract: Brooklyn residents Jacob Winterhalt and Joachim Carels describe friendship forged on their common experiences as stay-at-home dads.

headline.main: A Bond Forms for Two Stay-at-Home Brooklyn Fathers

docs.snippet: One evening last June, some of the Republican Party's wealthiest donors gathered for a cocktail party at an exclusive resort in Deer Valley, Utah, during a three-day retreat hosted by former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney....
docs.lead_paragraph: One evening last June, some of the Republican Party's wealthiest donors gathered for a cocktail party at an exclusive resort in Deer Valley, Utah, during a three-day retreat hosted by former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney.

headline.main: How the Republican Elite Turned a Blind Eye to the Rise and Rise of Donald Trump
headline.print_headline: How the Republican Elite Turned a Blind Eye to the Rise and Rise of Donald Trump

docs.snippet: The aggressive measure would eliminate full-contact practices during the regular season as a way to avert concussions and other injuries in the sport....
docs.lead_paragraph: The aggressive measure would eliminate full-contact practices during the regular season as a way to avert concussions and other injuries in the sport.
docs.abstract: Ivy League football coaches agree to ban full-contact hitting during regular-season practices, heeding evidence showing restricting contact leads to decrease in concussions; remarkable decision is expected to influence tackling policy at all levels of sport; Dartmouth coach who pioneered approach claims it has improved his team.

headline.main: Ivy League Moves to Eliminate Tackling at Football Practices
headline.print_headline: Ivy League Moves to End Full Contact at Practices

docs.snippet: The U.N. Security Council on Wednesday unanimously approved the toughest sanctions on North Korea in two decades, reflecting growing anger at Pyongyang's latest nuclear test and rocket launch in defiance of a ban on all nuclear-related activity....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. Security Council on Wednesday unanimously approved the toughest sanctions on North Korea in two decades, reflecting growing anger at Pyongyang's latest nuclear test and rocket launch in defiance of a ban on all nuclear-related activity.

headline.main: UN Approves Toughest Sanctions on North Korea in 20 Years
headline.print_headline: UN Approves Toughest Sanctions on North Korea in 20 Years
